referenceObject.reference: Wunderlich, J. (2008c). On extant and fossil spiders (Araneae) of the RTA-clade in Eocene European ambers of the families Borboropactidae, Corinnidae, Selenopidae, Sparassidae, Trochanteriidae, Zoridae sl. l., and of the superfamily Lycosoidea. Beiträge zur Araneologie 5: 470-523, 859, 862-867.
